description: The construction of 3 six-eight storey buildings on the site of William House and the former public car park adjacent, Childers Street SE8, comprising  18 live/work units, 8 one bedroom flats, 50 two bedroom self-contained flats and 8 commercial units (Use Class B1) with access off Childers Street.
site_name: William House and former public car park
site_number: William House and former public car park
